SQL.GET_LATEST_REFURB_REPLACE_EQUIP_INFO: with claim_equipment as ( select claim_id, make, model, serial_number, sku, imei_number, comments, claim_equipment_id from (select ce.claim_id, (select m.description from elp_manufacturer m where m.manufacturer_id = ce.manufacturer_id) make, ce.model, ce.serial_number, ce.sku, ce.imei_number, ce.comments, ce.claim_equipment_id, rank() over(partition by ce.claim_id, ce.claim_equipment_type_id, ce.manufacturer_id order by ce.created_date desc) rank from elp_claim_equipment ce where ce.claim_equipment_type_id = :claim_equipment_type_id) where rank=1) select * from claim_equipment ce where ce.claim_id = :claim_id
